compatibility.notes: The GFDL-1.1-only license has strong copyleft provisions, meaning that any derivative work must also be licensed under GFDL-1.1. This can lead to incompatibility with permissive licenses.

key_requirements: The Document must be distributed under the same license.
Any modifications must also be free and available under the same terms.
license.name: GFDL-1.1-only
obligations: Must include a copy of the license when distributing the Document.
Must include a copyright notice and a notice of the license.
Must state changes made to the Document if modified.
Must keep Invariant Sections intact if they are present.
